'''Primogems''' are the premium [[Currencies|currency]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

==Uses==
Primogems can be used to:
* Replenish [[Original Resin]], for 50–200 Primogems to replenish 60 Original Resin.
* Buy [[Acquaint Fate]] or [[Intertwined Fate]] in [[Paimon's Bargains]] or the [[Wishes]] menu, for 160 Primogems each.
* Purchase [[Battle Pass]] levels for 150 Primogems each level.

You can also obtain Primogems by converting them from [[Genesis Crystal]]s, however note that '''you cannot convert it vice versa.'''

===Non-Renewable Sources===
* One-time Star's Bounty for Floor 1–8 of [[Spiral Abyss]] (2,400 total) (every 3 stars on a floor rewards 100 Primogems)
* Completing [[Archon Quests]], [[Story Quests]], [[Hangout Events]] and [[World Quests]]
* [[Adventurer Handbook]] Experience rewards (900 total)
* [[Exploration]]
** Unlocking [[tutorials]] (rewards 1 or 2 depending on the tutorial unlocked)
** Completing [[Domains|One-Time Domains]]
** Opening [[chests]] (rewards 0, 2, 5, 10, 20 or 40 depending on the rarity of the chest opened and its location)
** Discovering [[Teleport Waypoints]] and [[Statues of The Seven]] (840 total)
** Leveling up [[Statues of The Seven]] (720 total)
** Certain other interactables, such as [[Someone's Drifting Bottle]]
* Participating in [[Events]]
* [[Promotional Codes]] given out periodically
* Occasional Mails
** Version Maintenance Compensation
** Compensation Primogems due to developer oversight
** Primogems rewarded from a certain milestone
* Completing [[Achievements]] (5,200+ total)
* [[Housing|Serenitea Pot]]
** [[Trust Rank]] rewards (600 total)
** [[Housing/Sets#Gift Sets|Gift Sets]] rewards from [[Housing#Companions|Companions]] (40 per owned character, excluding the [[Traveler]])
* [[Adventure Rank]] [[Adventure Rank/Adventurers' Guild Rewards|Rewards]]
* [[HoYoLAB Community Daily Check-In]] (bonus 100 Primogems given out for your first time visiting the site)

==Trivia==
* The word Primogem is a portmanteau of the words "primordial" and "gem".
* The Chinese, Japanese, and Korean term for Primogem is "原石" (primordial stone). The wording follows the game title Genshin "原神" (primordial god) and the term for demigods ''[[allogenes]]'' (also "原神").
